form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: THE FERTILIZER CORPORATION OF INDIA LTD. GORAKHPUR DIVISION

full_text: Telegram: "FERTILIZER" Gorakhpur Telephones 697 & 638 Gorakhper THE FERTILIZER CORPORATION OF INDIA LTD. GORAKHPUR DIVISION Regd. Office & Head Office: F-43 SOUTH EXTENSION AREA PART i. RING ROAD, NEW DELHI THE 5 - SEP 1968 Other Units / Divisions: DIFI P. O. FERTILIZER FACTORY SINDRI (BIHAR) NAYA NANGAL (PUNJAB) TROMBAY (MAHARASTRA) NAMRUP (ASSAM) Our Ref. No. GP/PF-89 (121) 16414 GORAKHPUR (U.P.) DURGAPUR (WEST BENGAL) Your Ref. No. SERVICE CERTIFICATE TO WHOM SO EVER IT MAY CONCERN This is to certify that Shri V.S. Pahwa s/o Late Iala Ladha Ram has worked in this Organisation. I) As Executive Engineer (Civil) in the scale of Pso 600-40-1000- 50/2-1150 We e.f. 8.9. 1956 to 10. 12. 1957 in the Nongal Unit, Naya Nangal (Punjab). ii) As Public Health Engineer in the scale of Rso 1300-50-1600 W.e.f. 11.12.1957 to 24.90 1961 in the Nangal Unit. iii) As Dy.Chief Engineer (Public Health) in the scale of Rso 1300-50-1600 W.3.0. 25.9. 1961 to 14.5 1964 in the Trombay Unit, Bombay. iv) As Dy. Chief Engineer (Public Health) in the scale of Rs. 1300-50-1600 We3ef. 15.5. 1964 to 15.3 3. $1967 in the Gorakhpur Unit, Gorakhpur U.P. Last pay drawn by him was Pso 1600/- + Pio 150/- as Special Pay. He was superannuated W.e.f. 15th March 19 67 after attaining the Age of 59 years. During his stay in this Organisation his work & conduct was found satisfactory. BUILDING Shri V.S. Pahwa, JOHN FEDERATION 02203 Miny A. N. NE8, c/o Shri V.P. Pahwa, Employee Officer. F.C.I. Colony, GORAKHPUR UNIT. BOSTON, organial seen & 12/08/68 the usu
